name: Christmas Cannon (Keeya)
description:
Christmas Cannon

A Christmas game we created in 2019. Shoot gifts into chimneys or bounce them off other random stuff for extra points and combos.

Be sure to try out the flying gift cam!

Desktop: aim with wasd, charge and fire with space.
Mobile controls: aim in upper part of the screen and touch/hold lower area to charge and fire.

Additional credits:
Made with Google Fonts "Mountains of Christmas"
Soniss GameAudio Bundles
"Wish Background" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
